thread.title: Naomie Harris looks delighted as she receives OBE from the Queen: see pictures
thread.title_full: Naomie Harris looks delighted as she receives OBE from the Queen: see pictures

title: Naomie Harris looks delighted as she receives OBE from the Queen: see pictures
text:
Naomie Harris looks delighted as she receives OBE from the Queen: see pictures February 23, 2017 by Sharnaz Shahid Moonlight actress Naomie Harris received her OBE from the Queen in London on Thursday, just days before she flies out to Los Angeles for the Oscars Leave a comment 
Oscar nominee Naomie Harris has officially became an Office of the British Empire. The 40-year-old, who for her roles in James Bond and Moonlight , was honoured by the Queen at Buckingham Palace for her services to drama on Thursday afternoon. Dressed in a striking Mary Katrantzou number, the star appeared delighted as she received her OBE in front of a large audience. Following the ceremony, Naomie credited her career to director Danny Boyle for "taking a chance" on her at the start of her career. "This is really phenomenal," she told reporters. "This is representing my country and being recognised for having made a contribution to the nation. It can't get better than that."
